summary: The Mages Guild Ritual quests didn't have complete quest markers. Now they do!
descriptionHtml:
This is daventry's request.

This mod does two things.

ONE: it adds a new objective per quest. When you reach 100 in that skill, you will receive an objective telling you to speak to the quest giver.

TWO: The Illusion and Destruction Ritual Quests don't give you much help as to where to go. They now have quest markers added.

This is untested so far, so there may be errors or incomplete components. Please let me know if this is the case.

_________________
